sheet_title: Title 24 CF-1R Compliance Certificates (Tiled — IAQ, Construction, Water Heating, HVAC, Signatures)
prepared_by: URO DESIGN (P.O. BOX 41011, Long Beach, CA 90853)
description: Second Title 24 sheet containing multiple tiled CF-1R Certificate of Compliance forms from CBECC-Res. Includes indoor air quality (IAQ) table, building construction assembly layers, water heating system specs, HVAC heat pump/fan system tables, building envelope HERS verification, and the responsible person declaration signed by Lawrence Gordon of URO Designs, LLC. CHEERS watermark present throughout.
key_content: Compliance method: Residential Performance Compliance
Software: CBECC-Res version 2022.3.000, schema ver.2023R01
HERS Provider: CHEERS
Registration Date: 9/22/2025 14:14
Calculation Date: 2025-09-12T08:36:53
Documentation Author: Lawrence Gordon, URO Designs, LLC, Los Angeles, CA 90041
Building construction: R-1 Asphalt Shingle roof, R-30 ceiling insulation, R-30 exterior floor insulation, R-13 interior floor
Framing: Wood framed, standard spacing (16 or 24 O.C.)
IAQ: Exhaust fan system, airflow ~26 CFM, fan efficiency 0.6
QII (Quality Insulation Installation): Not Required
Building Envelope Air Leakage verification: Not Required
Water heating: Heat pump water heater system
HVAC system: Heat pump (central), Heat Pump System 1
HVAC fan system verification items: multiple noted as Not Required
APPROVED by City of Long Beach, 10/29/25, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: Exact SEER2/HSPF2 heat pump efficiency ratings
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: Exact water heater UEF rating
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: Exact HVAC fan wattage values
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specs (may be on another sheet or not applicable)
NOT SHOWN: Compliance margins (proposed vs standard for heating/cooling)
NOT SHOWN: Climate zone number (likely on T-1 or another CF-1R page)

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) table (Page 10 of 13)
